title: filtering what shows up on my Firefox home page
content:
Hello, Does anyone know how I can customize what shows up on my Firefox home page? I would like to block certain content. I have attached an image.

Or is there a way that I can block certain web pages altogether? If they never showed up I would be happy. Thank you,
creator: thechoop

title: Can't Change New Tab Option
content: I'm running the latest version of Mozilla Firefox 89.0.2. I want every new tab I open to go to google.comand not have to select it from the Firefox menu. How can I do this?
creator: rolomart

title: Transferring exceptions for "Delete cookies and site data when Firefox is closed"
content:
Hi folks. I am looking to copy the Exception List for Cookies and Site Data from one PC to another.

I know the exception list is stored in permissions.sqlite - is it safe to replace this file on the destination PC with the version from the source PC? From what I understand, there is other permission-related information in the file, so I don't want to screw things up.

Maybe there an entirely better way to migrate the list? I have Sync set up, but it doesn't look like this information is part of what's synced.

Thanks in advance!
creator: nickdaniele

title: Can't login to review add-ons without "Enable two-step authentication"
content:
Can't login to review add-ons without completing "Enable two-step authentication". Never asked for two-step authentication, do not want it, WILL NEVER USE IT. Blatant privacy invasion, not a "security measure"

Does not give any option to not use it, if you try cancelling set-up it kicks you out and won't login. Is this it for firefox? Is there no other way to actually access your add-ons account?
creator: james.wilkinson

title: No access to searche engines/sites on FF.
content:
Since today I am not able to use any search engine (google, bing, yahoo search) on FireFox. I constantly get the "Did Not Connect: Potential Security Issue" error. All of them work perfectly well on MS Edge though. No problems on FF with other services (mail, maps, translate...) from the same providers. No recent SW/HW changes. Using Windows 10 for WS and MS Defender only. Noticed that "reCAPTCHA" fields in various sites are not shown either under FF.

BR!

PS Resetting FF did not solve the problem.
creator: dkdesignltd

title: without warnind my firefox settings changed. I have been looking for the options button for 30 minutes. I can't find it.
content: Without warning my firefox settings changed. I have been looking for the options button for 30 minutes. I can't find it. It is not under the 3bar menu on top right. It is not under settings or more tools.
creator: 2pickledeggs

title: Firefox
content:
Have recently uninstalled SSL certificate for domain marycliff.co.uk which now points to clifford-evans.com via masked web forwarding. However hard I try and test this forwarding in Firefox, it always converts the URL to https which invalidates the web forwarding process as clifford-evans.com already has SSL.

I have reinstalled Firefox and disabled HTTPS-Only Mode in Privacy and Security, but the https still appears for marycliff.co.uk and I can't see the web forwarding because a notice appears "Secure Connection failed". Firefox is seeing an SSL certificate which in fact no longer exists.

The web forwarding works perfectly in Chrome, Edge Safari and Android Can anyone help please? Best wishes, Clifford
creator: music8

title: How to remove firefox disk image from desktop
content: This firefox icon is on my desktop (can be ejected but says it could be harmful) and I want it gone. How do I move it elsewhere on my computer so that it doesn't appear on my desktop?
creator: max.hermanson

title: Search Problems
content:
Why, when searching in the middle of the home page, does it shift up to the address bar to continue the search. This is really annoying when you are searching a phrase that is not a website.

Is there a way to disable it?
creator: justinfelder2

title: failed to connect to facebbok
content:
Hi,

When trying to open www.facebook.com got a "SSL_ERROR_DC_EXPIRED", however, facebook's site works just fine in Chromium. Firefox is up to date, version is 89.0.2. This also happens in Firefox Beta as well, which is up to date too. OS: Debian Bullseye/Testing. DE: KDE Plasma 5.21.5
creator: Moltke

title: Making print bolder as having difficulty seeing on some websites
content: Making print bolder as having difficulty seeing on some websites
creator: treasurer.essa

title: Suddenly Firefox Browser is unable to Browse.  Searches are met with "unable to connect" whatever chosen
content: See subject above
creator: hodgkison

title: FF Connection issues
content: All of a sudden FF will not connect to the internet. Other browsers will connect. It says: If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer’s network connection. If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure that Firefox is permitted to access the Web.)
creator: cello16

title: Where is the video downloader helper icon in the latest version?
content: Hello, until yesterday, I had the video downloader helper icon on the right hand side of my top list of sites near my Firefox account icon. Now in the 89.02 version, it's gone so I can't download directly movie trailers for example. How do I put that icon back on around there? Thanks Luc
creator: lchaput1

title: Norton has blocked my use of firefox
content: I can't get into my homepage at atlanticbb.com for my email and search engine.
creator: harleymarty2010

title: streamed/progressive download video
content:
Hi guru,

Would like to know is there anywhere else video packets received and video watched by means of streaming or progressive download could be found(or stored) in receiving computer other than in cache or temp folder please?

many thanks for your advice!
creator: eli_olsen

title: Como puedo cambiar el icono de carga de firefox de pestaña
content: como podría cambiar el icono de carga para que sea un reloj de arena
creator: licjuliobarajas

title: Headphone Sound Quality
content: Since the most recent Windows 10 update, I've noticed that when I use my Bluetooth headphones(over the ear), while the Firefox browser is open, the sound quality sounds distorted and low. When I use Google Chrome or Windows Edge the sound quality is considerably better(only if they are open while Firefox is closed). I notice that if I have Firefox open the sound is distorted regardless of what browser is open and as soon as I close Firefox the sound quality instantly improves....rather dramatically. This was not an issue with Firefox, before the last Windows 10 update. Any idea of what could be causing this problem and how too correct it?
creator: a.clark

title: Keeping history temporary in private browsing
content: In the past firefox kept browsing history in private mode till session was on. Now (current releases) it doesn't keep it anymore. Many people is probably happy but i really liked temporary history feature. Is there any settings i can bring this feature back? I would like to have browsing history in private mode till i close firefox.
creator: zygdresze1

title: Search results do not appear in bold
content:
When using the Google browser and using quotes the search results do not appear in bold in Firefox only.

I already cleared the cookies, but the problem remains.
creator: vitor.m.viseu

title: firefox need to be fix.
content: fix slowness, crashing, error messages on my computer
creator: tb945440

title: Problem in loading some article on my website.
content: Firefox is not displaying some article like dewalt router table plate dewalt router table plate on my website although it is perfectly fine with Chrome, IE and Safari. Any solution for this? Thanks in advance
creator: rileygabreil798

title: Sites not loading / running correctly wih Firefox 89.0.2 64 bit Win 10
content:
Been having problems using Firefox for sometme now on some sites but now it's reached the point of unusuable.

On this site https://www.profusionplc.com/index.html I am unable to complete the checkout process. It would not go the the second step og the process

Similarly on this site / page , the page won't load. i just get a twirling thingy.

I've cleared cache and cookies, run in troubeshoot mode, disabled addons, refreshed, tried different security settings all to no avail. Works just fine on Edge.

creator: CScotty

title: Multiple profiles in the same window? (different logged in google accounts for different tabs)
content:
This is a problem I never had a possible solution for.

I would like to have Youtube Music in a separate (pinned) tab, but in the same window as everything else.

The problem I have stems from youtube/google: I have 2 youtube accounts - once under my username, and one under my real name, and I don't remember how I ended up with that. I normally only use the account with my username and the "real name" account is mostly unused. But when migrating from Google Play Music, youtube decided to force me to use the "real name" account for that, and that's what I'm stuck with now.

So I would like to have youtube music, which need to be on account #2 open, whhile all other tabs are on google account #1. And when on the same profile, this is simply not possible. Switching account on one tab switches it for all others.

Is it possible to do that without a separate window open just for youtube music?
creator: Barteks2x

title: Sound crash while playing videos
content:
Hi,

I have a problem since a few days. While playing a video (on YouTube, Facebook or Twitter for example), i loose sound after about 20-30 seconds.

Here is how it occurs : 1/ I launch the video : the sound and the video plays correctly for about 20-30 seconds. 2/ Then, the video pauses, like if I had a connection problem. It tries to reconnect (the circle rotates) during approximatively 10-20 seconds. 3/ And finally, the video is back, playing where it stopped, but without any sound.

I tested Windows sound, and it works, even during that bug on Firefox. I tries to navigate in the video, reload the website : nothing works, still no sound. To get the sound back, I have to close Firefox and re-launch it (but the bug comes back randomly, but always with the same process as described below).

I don't know if this bug is linked to another one, but within the same period, I get another bug only with Firefox : I get Kernel Power errors that makes my computer freeze for 5 seconds then reboot, still randomly (i can spend a whole day without any reboot and then get 3 in a row, in a 5 minutes period). I don't see how these bugs can be related, but it seems... strange.

To come back to my sound issue, I tried simultenaously with Google Chrome (both windows with the same video launched at the same time) : Google Chrome don't meet that bug while Firefox's sound crashes. Can't explain that ...

I share with you my troubleshooting information, while the bug is occuring (i didn't re-launch Firefox before sending that question), hope it will help !
creator: Norynsh

title: Firefox screenshot feature
content:
Firefox has removed the screenshot feature... no warning, no explanation, nothing. Sadly that drives me away to Edge - immediately.

I also notice that some sites' online payment systems do not like the Firefox browser... Something I noticed over the last 6 months. So Edge definitely has an Edge now.

I can't even take a screenshot of the problem to show you...

So the question is, what you going to do about it, Senor Mozilla?

title: YouTube video playback issue
content:
Up until today, I have been able to watch YouTube videos without any issues.

Today, I tried to watch a video on YouTube and got a green screen with weird blocky images on the left side (it's always the left side).

It's not on every video, and it's YouTube specific. I have tried other video platforms and watching YouTube videos that are embedded on other sites with no issues.

Some Videos on YouTube playback with absolutely no issues.

Some Videos changing the resolution down 1 setting allows playback.

Issue seems to go away when I disable hardware acceleration. As mentioned, there were no issues up until today and nothing has changed on the desktop. It was literally fine up until I went to bed. Woke up this morning and the issue started.

Image of issue attached.

It won't stop. It pops up all the damn time. Even in a Private Window. But if I turn it off then anyone can just see what my passwords are?

I get the impression that mozilla is definitely trying to drive users away. I'm actually seriously considering to remove firefox completely from all my devices now.

Does anybody have an explanation or remedy?

title: Cookies and site Data >> Exceptions are not synchronized
content:
Hello dear community,

I am using Firefox on two different devices. Thanks to Firefox Sync this is also a wonderful experience.

Recently I created an exception list for websites and their cookies. With the checkmark "delete all cookies when starting Firefox" a great thing. All cookies are deleted, just not those in the whitelist. All good.

Unfortunately the whitelist was not transferred to the other device. However, the option "delete all cookies when starting Firefox" did. Now all cookies are gone and the whitelist too.

Am I doing something wrong? Have I possibly not understood the concept correctly?

Thank you in advance!

Many greetings Sascha

title: High CPU usage
content:
I have ryzen 5 3400g, 16 GB dual channel ddr4 RAM,WD sn550 NVME SSD.

i never have trouble running firefox and can open right after booting up too.

but the problem i have is that after few minutes of using firefox will take up more than 50% of CPU. (which doesnt slow down firefox but heats the CPU up and makes multi tasking slower obviously)

And the unique part is if i click end task on that particular process it will end that CPU drain and firefox will still remain open without affecting any of my open tabs.

once i end task forcefully it wont happen again in that session but will happen again the next time i boot up my pc and use firefox.

In some cases it happens even if i dont open firefox and just connect the internet to my pc.
